name: Mastermind
description: Masterminds manipulate others through tactics, misdirection, and keen insight.

3.name: Master of Intrigue
3.description: You gain proficiency with disguise kits, forgery kits, and one gaming set. You also learn two languages of your choice.

3.name: Master of Tactics
3.description: You can use the Help action as a bonus action. When you do so, the target can be within 30 feet of you.

9.name: Insightful Manipulator
9.description: You can use an action to analyze a creature and learn information about its capabilities.

13.name: Misdirection
13.description: When you are targeted by an attack while a creature is within 5 feet of you, you can redirect the attack to that creature.
